pageContext.claim: “California forces you to build a bad car that doesn't work well, and there are a lot of reasons for not doing it that way.”
pageContext.analysis: California's auto emissions standards are not as strict as Trump claims. Some automakers actually support them. Ford, BMW, Honda and Volkswagen reached a deal with California to toughen gas mileage and greenhouse gas emissions standards rather than join the Trump administration's push to relax them nationwide
